text_block_list.text:
I couldn't forget about Manhattan Cafe's performance 
that night. I knew I needed to see it for myself one 
more time, so I set off for the track, when…
(plunk…)
The lights went out…

"Saves me turning them off, I guess…" 
I told myself, and went on my way.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Once more… this time…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You'll see… this time I'll catch you…

She was obviously chasing her "friend" tonight 
as well. She was giving it everything, but…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Still… so… far…

Maybe it was because she was fixated on her target, 
but her form was off, her pace erratic…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Still… not there… not even close…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Ah…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …Hello.
choice_data_list: I hope I'm not intruding. Mind if I ask you something?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Eh?
choice_data_list: About your friend. How she runs.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
But… why…? 
You… can't even…

Can't even see her? That's why I needed her to tell me. 
How is her form? When does she time her attacks?

If I knew that, maybe I could give her some advice. 
I wanted to do anything I could to help her. But…
choice_data_list: I'm sorry. You're right, this is none of my…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
My friend…… she's… 
Fast. Very fast…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Yes………

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Yes………

Obviously she was still suspicious. She wasn't 
going to tell me everything right away.

Still, I decided to keep going down 
to the track at night to see her.

And every time I got up to leave, a window would 
suddenly blow open… or a book would fall from the 
shelf… or the TV would turn on by itself.
And I wasn't the only one who was getting used to things…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Tonight, she's… wild…? 
She has more… drive… more passion…

She was still a little wary, but gradually Manhattan Cafe started 
to open up to me about her "friend"…

text_block_list.name: Colleague A
text_block_list.text:
It's easy to say you're just going to scout someone, but finding 
a good Uma Musume is hard. How about you. Find someone?

After seeing her run, I'd decided I wanted 
to take Manhattan Cafe on as her trainer.

But I'd still never seen this "friend" of 
hers. Would she be able to accept that?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: He came again yesterday. To help me.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Maybe I'm just a novelty for him. Maybe he's not serious. 
Maybe I should ask him to leave me alone…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
With his advice… I feel… 
… just ever so slightly, but…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I feel like I could… get closer to you. To catching you.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I wonder if… he will come again tonight…

I'd been visiting Manhattan Cafe at the track every night 
recently. I was wondering if perhaps it would better to give her 
some space tonight. When…
(creak…)
… The door opened? Then suddenly…

A powerful force… like I was being pulled out 
into the hall by something invisible…!
I decided I probably should go to the track tonight after all.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Hello. 
You're… earlier than usual.

Something about her voice seemed… lighter than usual. Even… 
happy? I guess it was the right choice to come after all.

At the track the next day, I looked around to 
see if I could find Manhattan Cafe. When…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh-ho. Looking for Cafe, are we? Most of the other trainers try 
to stay as far away from her as possible, but…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Come with me. 
Your sense of curiosity intrigues me…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: What is she…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Welcome to my laboratory! What do you think? A veritable 
cathedral to knowledge, is it not!? That half of the room is 
Cafe's space, by the way.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
But enter at your peril! Terrible things befall 
those who trespass! I left some papers in there 
once and they spontaneously combusted!

What a mysterious place. Like a slice of some parallel reality, 
or a gateway, connecting to someplace unknown…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
A psychologist could have a field day analyzing that lot. 
Like a dream world, made real.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Tell me. What do you think? 
About Manhattan Cafe's "friend". Do you think she exists?
choice_data_list: Well, Manhattan Cafe says she does, so…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hmm. Leaving aside what we might mean by the word 
"exist"… you can't see her, correct? Of course, I 
can't either. And neither can anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
To believe in such a thing would be the very definition of 
"unscientific". And yet. You can still believe she exists…?
choice_data_list:
There's more to this world than 
what we can see with our eyes.

text_block_list.text:
That's right. What we see… depends on where we stand. 
We all see things that no one else can.

You can't say something isn't real just because you're in the 
wrong place to see it. That's what I told Agnes Tachyon…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, very GOOD! 
That is exactly it! That is the unknown! That… is possibility!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Thanks to you, perhaps I won't have wasted my time after all.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
This calls for a celebration! I'll put on some tea! Oh come now, 
don't be scared by the luminescence! It tastes just fine.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: He cannot see…… and yet…
